title: How Many Calories in a Cup of Sugar?

h1: How Many Calories in a Cup of Sugar?
assumptions: Granulated white sugar; standard US cup measure (≈200 g, loosely scooped).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by sugar type, brand, packing density, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of granulated sugar contains ~774 kcal, all from carbohydrates.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a cup of sugar?
faqs.a: Approximately 774 kcal for one cup (200 g) of granulated white sugar.
Yes, 100% carbohydrates—200 g carbs and sugars per cup, with no protein or fat.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in a cup?
faqs.a: About 200 g of granulated sugar fits in one standard cup.

faqs.q: Does brown sugar have the same calories as white?
faqs.a: Similar, but slightly less—around 760 kcal per cup due to minor moisture differences.
Sugar adds empty calories; one cup exceeds daily added sugar limits for most diets.
